title._content: Black Mt Mission site, Chinle Ariz

description._content:
Caption:  1955.  Black Mt. Mission, Chinle, Arizona.  Buildings from left to right: Hogan where all church services are held; nurse's sleeping quarters and Navaho spare bedroom; middle metal house is the kitchen-living room; next metal building is the clinic and Weaver bedroom.  Small black building to the extreme right is the power house where the light plant is housed.  The large white box in foreground is a mail box built large enough to handle all the many boxes constantly being received.

Citation:  Mennonite Board of Missions Photograph Collection.  Mission to Arizona,  1950-1970. IV-10-7.2  Box 1 Folder 49, Photo #24.   Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
